resources.string:
Welcome to the Anti Pokemon application!

The main target is to find all of the objects located in red areas on the map.
Step into one of those to get information about the object.
You need to get closer than 30 meters to the object to consider it to be found.
The application can\'t run without GPS tracking permission.\n\nYou\'ve returned back to the intro screen.
Why do we need your GPS coordinates?
The application needs to track the distance from you to the objects you looking for.\n\nPlease, give your permission this time
A fontain near the 1st housing of SPbPU
A monument near the entrance to the main building
A monument in honor of artesian well used during the blockade of WW2
A monument in honor of Petr and Fevronia. Opened in 2016.
Hogwarts resembling part of the Polytechnic university
A monument in honor of the October revolution hero
A monument in honor of aviators. It is located in the western part of Sosnovka park
A monument in honor of Leningrad citizens who did not surrender in the WW2
In honor of Leningrad citizens\' bravery
The application cannot work without Google Play Services installed since it uses Google Maps SDK.
